note.para: The stdev operator provides the same functionality as the stdev aggregate. See the stdev aggregate reference page for more information.

informalexample.para: This example finds the standard deviation of each row of a 2-dimensional array.

step.para: Create a 1-attribute, 2-dimensional array called m3x3:CREATE ARRAY m3x3 <val:double>[i=0:2,3,0,j=0:2,3,0];
Store values of random values between 0 and 1 in m3x3:store(build(m3x3,random()%9/10.0),m3x3);[ [(0.5),(0.6),(0)], [(0.8),(0.8),(0.4)], [(0.1),(0.8),(0.6)] ]
Select the standard deviation of each row of m3x3:var(m3x3,val,i);This query returns:[(0.321455),(0.23094),(0.360555)]
